remarks: The projective map of the join of two lattice elements.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmapj2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapj2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
pmapj2.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapj2.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pmapj2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pmapj2N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( M ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( ( M ` X ) .+ ( M ` Y ) ) ) ) ) $.
